name: Torecower (itch)
description:
🚧 This game is in active development! (Early Access) 🚧

Torecower is an arcade wave-based minimalist game where you build automatic turrets to shoot enemies. Each turret have an unique attack behaviour.

After finishing a wave, you can grab an upgrade of your chosen path on the skill tree. Choose wisely to make your turrets stronger.

Features

  • 12+ turrets, each with unique attacks 
  • 4+ classes, each with unique effects and behaviours 
  • 20 waves, making the game harder on the late-game 
  • 5+ enemies, each with unique attributes 

⚒️ We're working hard on NEW GAME+ and infinite mode ⚒️
